gui.menu module¶

This module defines the Menu for the GUI.

class gui.menu.MyMenu(masterFrame, root)¶

Bases: tkinter.Menu

Public Class

Subclassed tk.Menu to add to our GUI.

Constructor

Creates the various Menu labels and commands. Registers a handler with each command.

Parameters:
  • masterFrame (tk.Frame) – Parent/Master frame that this is attached to.
  • root (TK) – The Tkinter root instantiation.
_logStdOut()¶

Private Method

Sets the application’s Setup Config to log to None. This will typically indicate to the application to log to the console (sys.__stdout__).

Returns:n/a:
_selectArgs()¶

Private Method

Opens an Open Filename Dialog to select a new XML Arguments definition file. If valid file is selected will update the application’s Setup Configuration with this file.

Returns:n/a:
_selectFiles()¶

Private Method

Opens an Ask-Open Filename Dialog to select a specific lustre file to test. Updates the application’s Setup Configuration with this file.

Returns:n/a:
_selectFolder()¶

Private Method

Opens a Ask Directory Dialog to select the folder in which to search for lustre files to test. Updates the application’s Setup Configuration with this file.

Returns:n/a:
_setLogFile()¶

Private Method

Opens a Save-As File Dialog to choose a log file.

Returns:n/a:
_showOptions()¶

Private Method

Opens a pop-up dialog to display the selected lustre files, argument XML definition file and Log File.

Returns:n/a:
